AboutParagraph: Msk Greenhouse Technologies Our company MSK SERA TEKNOLOJİLERİ SAN.TİC.LTD.ŞTİ. to serve in greenhouse electricity, irrigation air conditioning, greenhouse automation sectors. It continues its activities with its title. Our company has adopted the principle of honest, reliable and quality service. Under the name of MSK SERA TEKNOLOJİLERİ SAN.TİC.LTD.ŞTİ, we develop our company portfolio and expand our fields of activity by including Russia, Azerbaijan, Turkmenistan and the Middle East countries. In addition, our company manufactures fertilizing machines in accordance with European standards in automation systems. As a company, our mission is to provide solutions to the equipment demand of the industry by providing more precise and professional fertilization automation and climate control devices. We offer better quality service and spare parts guarantee for the service and spare parts shortage we have identified. We will continue our activities in the greenhouse sector in the future without compromising on quality, with our accurate and solution-oriented services that our company has shown in meeting the needs of the sector.
Subject: Subject
